review: He seemed uninterested the entire time. He was using his phone, and did even notice when his patient left the room

I had minor fever and went to doc. He asked me to test mp,typhoid,dengue and blood worth 6.5k with no reason as I had no symptom. The results came negative which was expected. He gave me calcium tablets and paracetamol. Paracetamol is understood but why calcium tablets in fever. I am not a doctor but this is basic. Although I have started taking Azithromycin he suggested me Amoxycillin. 

Not very happy this time when a basic blood test can show that I have viral fever.

This doctor is least bothered about you *** ** **** ** **** **** ****** He will write a prescription and never entertain any follow ups. He and his team at Apollo will ask you to pay and book a fresh appointment even if you approach him the next day after your first consultation. *** **** ************** ****** **** **** **** ******* ****** ***** ** *** ** **** ******* You cannot deny the patient their rights for follow up consultations.
not good results with the consultation and directed to other physician.. Response should be quicker
We reached the hospital and were told doctor was on leave. This is completely UNACCEPTABLE . Inform people if doctors are not available
